titles.title: To expand the Southwestern Pennsylvania Heritage Preservation Commission, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

bill.summary: 8/5/1993--Introduced. Expands the nine-county region in Southwestern Pennsylvania (known as the Allegheny Highlands) to include the counties of Greene and Fayette. Increases the membership on the Southwestern Pennsylvania Heritage Preservation Commission from nine to eleven members.
